title: Anne-Marie's Route
name: Anne-Marie's Route
description:
A Map by Bassoannemarie

Where I've been...

properties.name: Bath, Maine
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieBath, MEAt this seemingly far off place at the end of the earth I spent my last two years of high school. The way I look at it as long as I am near the water, I can live anywhere. Maine is under-rated and the sunsets were like this pic.

properties.name: Bellingham
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieBellingham, wa Bellingham is a sweet college town on the Puget Sound with lots of beautiful rain forest around. Seattle is close by and so is Canada. I did my undergrad in American Cultural Studies here - Fairhaven College @ Western Washington University. It was a small interdisciplinary alternative school within a large University.

properties.name: Buffalo and Erie County Public Library
properties.description: Posted by Bassoannemarie1 Lafayette Sq, Buffalo, NYThis was the first library I ever worked in. First as a Senior Page, then as a Librarian Trainee, then as a Librarian. This is a great public library with a HUGE collections budget. They have almost everything you could want. The best parts of working here - Choosing DVD\'s for the library & traveling to the city branches with laptops to teach 10-14 year old kids (most of whom had no home computer)research/technology skills.

properties.name: Mexico City, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieMexico City, MexicoI lived here in an apartment with my sister the summer after I graduated from high school. La gente de Mexico son muy amable.

properties.name: Morelia, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieMorelia, MexicoI studied Spanish here for a quarter my junior year of college.

properties.name: Oakland, California
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieOakland CaliforniaAfter ten years away from California, this is where I came back to live. I like it here because it is far away enough from where I grew up to enjoy the CA. sun without tripping over my family at the grocery store, but close enough to drive over my parents house for Sunday dinner.

properties.name: Palace of fine arts
properties.description: Posted by Bassoannemarie Mexico City Mexico

properties.name: The house where I grew up

properties.name: UB
properties.description: Posted by BassoannemarieAmherst, NY 14260University at Buffalo is where I went to Graduate School to get my MLIS. Buffalo was freezing cold and I don\'t think I ever want to go back there but it served its\' purpose.
